mapper.sql: USER_ID, ORG_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, USER_CH_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_SEX, USER_PHOTO_URL, PROVINCE_ID, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_ID, CITY_NAME, COUNTRY_ID, CONTRY_NAME, HOBBY, INTRODUCE, CREATED_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (USER_ID, ORG_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, USER_CH_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_SEX, USER_PHOTO_URL, PROVINCE_ID, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_ID, CITY_NAME, COUNTRY_ID, CONTRY_NAME, CREATED_DATE) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userChName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{userPhotoUrl,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contryName,jdbcType=CHAR}, now())

insert into sys_user
USER_ID,
ORG_ID,
USER_NAME,
USER_PASSWORD,
MOBILE_PHONE,

USER_SEX,

PROVINCE_ID,
PROVINCE_NAME,

CITY_NAME,
COUNTRY_ID,
CONTRY_NAME,
HOBBY,
INTRODUCE,
CREATED_DATE,

mapper.update:
update sys_user
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_CH_NAME = #{userChName,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_BIRTHDAY = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
USER_PHOTO_URL = #{userPhotoUrl,jdbcType=CHAR},
PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVINCE_NAME = #{provinceName,jdbcType=CHAR},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=CHAR},
COUNTRY_ID = #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONTRY_NAME = #{contryName,jdbcType=CHAR},
HOBBY = #{hobby,jdbcType=CHAR},
INTRODUCE = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_user set ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_CH_NAME = #{userChName,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_BIRTHDAY = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, USER_PHOTO_URL = #{userPhotoUrl,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_NAME = #{provinceName,jdbcType=CHAR}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=CHAR}, COUNTRY_ID = #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTRY_NAME = #{contryName,jdbcType=CHAR}, HOBBY = #{hobby,jdbcType=CHAR}, INTRODUCE = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from sys_user where user_name = #{userName} and user_password = #{userPassword}
SELECT PROVINCE_NAME as name ,SUM(1) AS value FROM sys_user GROUP BY PROVINCE_NAME

select province_name as name, sum(case user_sex when 1 then 1 else 0 end) boy, sum(case user_sex when 2 then 1 else 0 end) girl, sum(case user_sex when 3 then 1 when null then 1 else 0 end) securty from sys_user group by province_name

select USER_CH_NAME as userChName,USER_SEX as userSex ,MOBILE_PHONE as mobilePhone,EMAIL as email ,PROVINCE_NAME as provinceName, CITY_NAME as cityName ,CONTRY_NAME as contryName,USER_BIRTHDAY as userBirthday,O.ORG_NAME orgName from sys_user U,sys_org O where U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_user (ORG_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, USER_CH_NAME, USER_SEX, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_NAME, CREATED_DATE) values
( #{u.orgId}, #{u.userName}, '123456', #{u.mobilePhone}, #{u.email}, #{u.userChName}, #{u.userSex}, #{u.provinceName}, #{u.cityName}, now() )
mapper.select: select u.USER_ID, ORG_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, USER_CH_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_SEX, USER_PHOTO_URL, PROVINCE_ID, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_ID, CITY_NAME, COUNTRY_ID, CONTRY_NAME, HOBBY, INTRODUCE, u.CREATED_DATE from sys_user u,sys_role_user_rel r where u.user_id = r.user_id and r.role_id = #{roleId} order by u.created_date limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from sys_user u,sys_role_user_rel r where u.user_id = r.user_id and r.role_id = #{roleId}
